data

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Person, java.lang.Comparable<User>

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements Person, java.lang.Comparable<User>
    The user class will be used to create an individual who will be participating in the survivor pool.
    Author:
    Graem Littleton, Kevin Brightwell, Jonathan Demelo, Ramesh Raj, Justin McDonald
